topic.topicTitle: Returning work as part of an Assignment
topic.topicDialog: You have the option to return a document through your Assignment for your teachers to mark.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, access the assignment your teacher has set.
Work through the assignment as normal by using the Menu bar.

If you've been asked to complete a worksheet that has been assigned to you, you will need to save a copy first, before completing the worksheet.

Alternatively, your teacher might ask you to create your own file to submit.
Once you have completed your work, use the Menu bar to go back to the Introduction page and use the Browse button to find your file.
Check that the correct file has been added to the assignment, and then click Submit.
Your work will then be submitted back to your teacher for marking.
